entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as a family member who lives with Harry and her husband Uncle Vernon. She hopes to squash the magic out of Harry.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as a family member who lives with Harry and his wife Aunt Petunia. He also hopes to squash the magic out of Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He has been attending Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for two years.

relationships.description: Aunt Petunia is a family member of Harry.
Uncle Vernon is a family member of Harry.
